description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. Have you ever wanted to be like your favorite musical artist or favorite athlete and show up to the club and just make it rain money in there?  Well here is a game that will bring you as close to that feeling as you can get, without actually spending $10,000 in one night!
